archetypes.name: Vegetarian Family One-Pot Global (Indian & Middle Eastern)
archetypes.description: From-scratch vegetarian family meals centered on hearty one-pot dals, stews, and pilafs with Indian and Middle Eastern flavors, ideal for leftovers and batch-friendly cooking.
archetypes.rationale: This fills the gap beyond the existing quick, mild SA/American weeknights by offering from-scratch, batchable Indian/Middle Eastern one-pot meals at 30–60 minutes with medium spice for families.
